item.title: PFX certificate for FREE for Power Pages
item.description:
Introduction

Do you want to deploy Power Pages on a custom domain securely without the need to buy a custom certificate? In this blog post, Iâ€™m going to show you how to do this quickly and easily acquire a PFX certificate that you can then use to deploy to Power Pages.

Pre-requisite

This is a brilliant tool for generating SSL, and it is simple to use and quick to deploy.
